entry.title: AngularJs Learning Note-2
entry.content:
Filter

  • use pipe “|”

    • the following example will give price the dolloar sign(localized), Specifies number of decimals html <em class="pull-right">{{product.price | currency}}</em>

  • Formatting with filters

    • Our Recipe {{ data | filter:options }}
    • date example {{'1388123412323' | date:'MM/dd/yyyy @ h:mma'}} => 12/27/2013 @ 12:50AM
    • uppercase & lowercase `{{‘octagon gem’ | uppercase}} => OCTAGON GEM
    • limitTo {{'My Description' | limitTo:8}} => My Descr
      <li ng-repeat="product in store.products | limitTo:3">
    • orderBy (descending order) <li ng-repeat="product in store.products | orderBy:'-price'">

images

  • Do not use <img src="{{product.images[0].full}}"/>
    • the browser tries to load the image before the Expression evaluates
  • Use <img ng-src="{{product.images[0].full}}"/>

tabs

  • When ng-click changes the value of tab
    • the {{tab}} expression auto gets updated.
  • Expressions define a 2-way Data binding
    • means Expressions are re-evaluated when a property changes. ``` html
      • Description
      • aaaa
      • bbbb
      {{tab}}
xxxxx1
xxxxx2
xxxxx3

`` - How to set initial value of tab? -

`

  • ng-class directive
    • Expression to evaluate, if true, set class to “active”, otherwise nothing.
    • <li ng-class="{ active:tab === 1}">

entry.title: AngularJs Learning Note-1
entry.content:
這是 code school AngularJs 的一些個人筆記, 希望我可以好好學習！

Things covered in Note-1

  • ENV setup
  • Directives – HTML annotations that trigger javascript behaviors
  • Modules – Where our application components live
  • Controllers – Where we add application behavior
  • Expressions – How values get displayed whthin the page

Prepare env

  • Download AngularJs
    • need angular.min.js
  • Download Twitter Bootstrap
    • need Bootstrap.min.css

Modules

  • write pieces of angular application.
  • define dependencies for our app.

``` html

ng-app –> attach the Application Module to the page, run this module when the document loads

ng-controller –> attach a controller function to the page

```

Expressions

``` html

I am 10

I am {{4 + 6}}

Hello you

{{“Hello” + “you”}} ```

More Operations

Sample app code

``` javascript // app.js (function(){ var app = angular.module(‘store’, []); app.controller(‘StoreController’, function(){

  this.product = gem;

});

// Sample javascript obj var gem = {

  name: "Dodecahedron',
  price: 2.95,
  description: '.....',

}

})();

```

``` html 

  <h1> {{store.product.name}} </h1>
  <h2> ${{store.product.price}} </h2>
  ...

{{store.product.name}} <– won’t work !! ```

built in directives

  • ng-show=“xxxx”
    • show the element if xxxx is true
  • ng-hide=“xxxx”
    • hide the element if xxxx is true
  • ng-repeat=“xxx in xxxarr” ex:<div ng-repeat="product in store.products">
    • repeat array elements
